name: Bug Princess 2 Lite
description:
≪ Game Overview ≫
Introducing the sequel to the "Mushihimesama" series!
Bringing "Bug Princess 2" straight from the arcade!
Guide Reco and Palm through bullets numerous bullets and aim for the Utakata Villge!

*This application will only consist the arcade version.

≪ Premium Version ≫

●The sequel to "Bug Princess", the new "Bug Princess 2" is now available for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad!

●3 different game modes with 4 levels of difficulty.
(Original Mode) A basic mode with less bullets.
(Maniac Mode) Relatively high bullet volumes.
(Ultra Mode) A mode featuring extreme difficulty.
Try all the game modes!
The 4 different difficulties will include Novice, Normal, Hard, and Hell.
Everyone can experience the world of "Bug Princess" from beginning shooting players to experts!

●Universal app with high resolution graphics!

●PRACTICE MODE
Practice Mode included to help boost your score! Beginner and veteran shooters, brush up to beat your friends!

●Versatility just for the Smartphone version.
Controls adapted to the iPhone feature slide controls for comfortable play! Dash and weave through Bullet Heaven!

●Compatible with GAMECENTER! Check the online rankings!
Rankings are available for every Modes and Stages.
Complete with players from around the world!
Go for a full achievement list!

###　Important: Please read the following before downloading this application.　###
●Compatibility: iPhone 3GS or later, iPod touch 3rd Gen. or later, iPad(iOS 4.3 or later)
●This application will use mass volume of memory. Please note the application may not function properly or shutdown without any notice when used with limited memory space.
●Turning ON the accessibility option setting may cause malfunctions in certain features.
